features: 【Optimal Preschool Toy Choice】Are you currently searching for toys for your grandchildren? Are you concerned about the safety of the toy? Are you contemplating whether the toys has any educational benefits, such as enhancing color recognition or encouraging creativity? If so, then you have arrived at the correct destination. Goodtiles 44PCS magnetic building blocks are the perfect choice for meeting all of your needs.

【Engaging STEM Toys】GOODTILES magnetic tiles are certified by STEM as an essential educational tool and have been tested and loved by parents. With vibrant colors and a translucent design that shines under light, these tiles captivate children's curiosity. They are perfect for children with ADHD or autism and are great for travel or outdoor play. Kids can create unique 2D or 3D structures, fostering creativity and developing STEAM-related skills.

【Superior safety and durability】We place great importance on the safety of toddler toys. Each magnetic tile is made of durable food-grade ABS plastic, and has successfully passed over 1000 drop tests with no damage or loss of integrity Additionally, the smooth edges and translucent design of the tiles ensure a safe and enjoyable building experience for kids of all ages.

【Wonderful Family Time】Our magnetic tiles not only enhance children's communication, problem-solving, and creativity skills, but also give parents an opportunity to actively participate in imaginative play with their kids. These enjoyable and meaningful toys help cultivate stronger relationships as parents and children collaborate to create their own masterpieces. They are perfect for quality family or friends bonding time and for creating cherished memories.

【Top Pick For Toy Gifts】Magna toys have gained widespread recognition in the market, thanks to their entertainment, STEM educational function, and interactive features. Perfect as family or preschool classroom game toys and classroom activities. make an excellent gift for your kids. They can be a incredible gift as a Christmas or birthday surprise for friends or kids. The possibilities for creative play are endless, and the more sets you have, the more enjoyable the experience becomes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Transparency Different colors of magnetic blocks, and has a high transparency, through the light can be projected with rainbow color patterns, it will be more beautiful than you imagine. Open Ended Toys Magnetic Tiles are those that can be used in a variety of ways depending on the children, the day, their imagination, and desire. They foster play, creativity, and imagination. STEAM Learning Toys STEM toys are Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math based toys geared towards curiosity, learning, and education.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really great set and value for your money!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these sets and my child is able to build a cute castle. She is obsessed with rainbows so this really hit the mark for a Christmas present. Plus it was a great price when I bought it. Like $12 a set or something like that. I LOVE that it comes with sturdy little storage drawstring bags, they really are a game changer for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Toy Set
reviews.reviewText: We love this set of blocks for our little nephew. He plays with it all the time! Great for creative building. Might want to get two sets to have enough to build bigger items

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toys for kids 6 and under
reviews.reviewText: My kids (6 yrs, 2.5 & 1) all play with these more than any other toys they have. Even with new toys, they go back to these. The included bag is sturdy and easy to see amongst their belongings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great magnetic tiles
reviews.reviewText: The magnets are strong. This is my favorite brand. My grandchildren love them. High quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for little kids to learn creativity and just think about the next thing they want to build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it, but could be stronger.
reviews.reviewText: I'll preface this by stating my daughter loves to play with these. They feel very high quality and it's comes with a versatile range of shapes to really help your child express themselves creatively. My only wish is that the magnets were a bit stronger. That isn't to say they do not function, but it can be hard to make more unique shapes stick. I still recommend it to family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and fun for children of all ages
reviews.reviewText: Our 1-year old grandson has already begun using the magnetic blocks, and our 10-year old granddaughter still enjoys building things with them. It's a great toy to develop imagination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Great quality and the kids LOVE IT!!
